text: Nicholas Roger SwardsonNick Swardson's bio on The Boston Phoenix website. Retrieved February 29, 2012. (born October 9, 1976)Nick Swardson's biography via the New York Times is an American actor, comedian, screenwriter and producer, best known for his role as Terry Bernadino in the series Reno 911!, for the work with Adam Sandler's Happy Madison Productions, and the sketch comedy series Nick Swardson's Pretend Time. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:Businesspeople from Minneapolis Category:Comedians from Minneapolis Category:Actors from Minneapolis Category:Writers from Minneapolis
title: Nick Swardson
